physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features the Singpaore river, along with several boats and rows of shophouses on the left hand side. Two human silhouettes can be seen rowing a smaller boat on the lower right hand side of the photograph. Numerous people can be seen walking on the street in between the boats and the shophouses.
title_text: Singapore River Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
subject_terms_1: rivers boats residential structures mercantile buildings
subject_terms_2: Black-and-white photography Singapore River (Singapore) Boats and boating Shophouses
